titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4828) to designate wilderness areas and a cooperative management and protection area in the vicinity of Steens Mountain in Harney County, Oregon, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-930, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4828 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule, the amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record offered by Mr. Walden of Oregon. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 295.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 609.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/3/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4828 (wilderness and management area designations).
